alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Montgomery; Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Toombs, south central Emanuel and eastern Montgomery Counties through 1015 AM EDT... At 945 AM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Kibbee to near Higgston to Uvalda, and moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Vidalia, Uvalda, Oak Park, Higgston, Santa Claus, Alston, Center, Toombs Central, Ohoopee, New Branch, Ponderosa, Kibbee, South Thompson, Rock Springs, Cedar Crossing, Johnson Corner, Normantown and Charlotteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
